LanguageData.AssignOverride.GizmoDesc: Allows this pawn to override assignment restrictions.
LanguageData.AssignOverride.Settings.EnableAll.Label: Enable override for all pawns
LanguageData.AssignOverride.Settings.EnableAll.Desc: When enabled, all pawns automatically override assignment restrictions. This also disables the toggle gizmo from rendering.
LanguageData.AssignOverride.Settings.RenderFloatMenuL: Render assignment override label in float menu
When enabled, appends the assignment override marker to prioritized manual work options.
LanguageData.AssignOverride.Settings.RestartNotice: Some settings take effect after restarting the game.
